welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Pasian di Prato, known for its rich history and stunning natural beauty. We invite you to immerse yourself in our city's warm atmosphere and discover all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Airfield Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Airfield Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Ronchi Dei Legionari Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aviano Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
